alert.note: Alert for Bibb (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 3:57AM CDT until March 26 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Bibb County in central Alabama... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 357 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brent, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brent, Centreville, Lawley, Talladega National Forest, Ashby, Brierfield Ironworks Park, West Centreville, Randolph, Trio and Bibb County Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
